title: About
text: Hi, I’m Thomas Price, a junior at Pitzer College majoring in International Political Economy and minoring in Data Science. I recently studied abroad in Spain, and the photo above is from a trip my friends and I took to Monte Carlo! The purpose of this website is to showcase how one can wrangle and visulualize data, feel free to find those examples in the drop down menu on your left!

title: Billboard Hot 100 Number Ones
text:
View Original Data Set Here

library(tidyverse)

billboard <- readr::read_csv(
  "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/main/data/2025/2025-08-26/billboard.csv"
)

artist_counts <- billboard |>
  group_by(artist) |>
  summarise(n = n()) |>
  arrange(desc(n))

top10_artists <- head(artist_counts, 10)


ggplot(top10_artists, aes(x = reorder(artist, n), y = n)) +
  geom_col(fill = "steelblue") +
  geom_text(aes(label = n), hjust = 1.2, color = "white", size = 4) +
  coord_flip() +   # flips so artists are readable
  labs(
    title = "Top 10 Artists by Number of Hot 100 Songs",
    x = "Artist",
    y = "Number of Songs"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()








image source

title: Thomas Price
text:
Hi! My name is Thomas Price and I am a current Senior at Pitzer College. At Pitzer, I study International Political Economy and Data Science. When I am not studying, you can find me playing tennis on our club tennis team, traveling around the country with the Claremont Debate Team or winning intramural Pickle ball Tournaments!

Being From San Francisco, I am a huge Giants fan, so if you support any LA team, kindly leave this website

title: US Gas Prices
text:
View the original TidyTuesday dataset

library(tidyverse)

weekly_gas_prices <- readr::read_csv(
  "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/main/data/2025/2025-07-01/weekly_gas_prices.csv",
  show_col_types = FALSE
)

weekly_gas_prices |>
  ggplot(aes(x = date, y = price)) +
  geom_line(color = "steelblue") +
  labs(
    title = "Weekly U.S. Gas Prices (1990–2025)",
    x = "Date",
    y = "Price (USD per gallon)"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()








image source
